answers.answer: I'm having mine in 3 days' time. Baby is still breech. Good luck with your c-section. I wish you all the best!!!

question: By c-section is scheduled in 17 days. That seems so far away, since I have preeclampsia. I might have one next week but my DR on vacation. I'm so exhausted I feel like crap I haven't been this tired my whole pregnancy. My hands and feet are numb my legs are so weak. Idk what to do all my doctors partner says is drink a gallon of water.
title: 17 days
